main.$description: Reflects the primary.main variable from the theme object

dark.$description: Used for hover states. Reflects the primary.dark variable from the theme object

light.$description: Reflects the primary.light variable from the theme object

hover.$description: Used for hover states. The token represents the value of action.hoverOpacity (0.04 by default) of the main token.

selected.$description: Used for selected states. The token represents the value of action.selectedOpacity (0.08 by default) of the main token.

focus.$description: Used for focus states. The token represents the value of action.focusOpacity (0.12 by default) of the main token.

outlinedborder.$description: Used for enabled states (e.g Button outlined variant). The token represents the value of outlinedBorderOpacity (0.5 by default) of the main token.
